column3:
GET posts article with valid 
path
column4:
Given Base URL is https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/
And Set method to GET
column5:
When set path to posts
And Click send button
Then API should return response 200 OK
column10:
{
        "userId": 1,
        "id": 1,
        "title": "sunt aut facere repellat provident occaecati excepturi optio reprehenderit",
        "body": "quia et suscipit\nsuscipit recusandae consequuntur expedita et cum\nreprehenderit 
          molestiae ut ut quas totam\nnostrum rerum est autem sunt rem eveniet architecto"
    }

column3: GET comments all article
column5:
When  set path to comments
And  Click send button
Then API should return 200 OK
And API should return body data postId, id, name, email, and body
column10:
{
        "postId": 1,
        "id": 1,
        "name": "id labore ex et quam laborum",
        "email": "Eliseo@gardner.biz",
        "body": "laudantium enim quasi est quidem magnam voluptate ipsam eos\ntempora quo necessitatibus\ndolor quam autem quasi\nreiciendis et nam sapiente accusantium"
    }

column3: GET comments article with valid field parameter using id
column5:
When  set path to comments?postId=<id>
And  Click send button
Then API should return 200 OK
And API should return body data postId, id, name, email, and body

column3: Get list albums
column5:
When  set path to albums
And  Click send button
Then API should return 200 OK
And API should return body data userId, id and title

column3: Get single album with valid id
column5:
When  set path to albums/<id>
And  Click send button
Then API should return 200 OK
And API should return body data userId, id and title

column3: Get single album with invalid id
column5:
When  set path to albums/"<string>"
And  Click send button
Then API should return 400 Bad Request

column3: Get single album with id exceed the limit
column5:
When  set path to albums/<id>
And  Click send button
Then API should return 404 Not Found

column3: Get single album with valid parameter
column5:
When  set path to albums?title=<title>
And  Click send button
Then API should return 200 OK
And API should return body data userId, id and title
column6:
Example:
| title |
| omnis laborum odio |
| eaque aut omnis a |

column3: POST posts with valid path and empty Request body only one field
column4:
Given Base URL is https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/
And Set method to POST
column5:
When set path to posts/
And Set request body name is "<title>" and "<body>"
And Click send button
Then API should return response 400 Bad Request
column6:
Example:
| title | body |
| Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem | Li Europan lingues es membres del sam familie. Lor separat |
| È universalmente riconosciuto che un lettore | normale blocco di testo leggibile |

column3: POST posts with valid path and empty request body only two field
column5:
When set path to posts/
And Set request body name is "<title>" 
And Click send button
Then API should return response 400 Bad Request
column6:
Example:
| title |
| Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem |
| È universalmente riconosciuto che un lettore |

column3: POST posts with valid path and invalid all Request body
column5:
When set path to posts/
And Set request body name is "<title>", "<body>", <user id>
And Click send button
Then API should return response 400 Bad Request

column3: POST posts with valid path and valid all data
column5:
When set path to posts/
And Set request body name is "<title>", "<body>", and <user id>
And Click send button
Then API should return response 201 Created
And API should return body data user id,  title, and body
column6:
Example:
| title | body | user id |
| Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem | Li Europan lingues es membres del sam familie. Lor separat | 2 |
| È universalmente riconosciuto che un lettore | normale blocco di testo leggibile | 3 |

column3: POST posts with invalid path
column5:

And Click send button
Then API should return response 400 Bad request
column6:
Example:

| Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem | Li Europan lingues es membres del sam familie. Lor separat | 2 |

column3: POST comments with valid path and empty Request body only two field
column5:
When set path to comments/
And Set request body name is "<name>"  and email is "<email>"
And Click send button
Then API should return response 400 Bad Request
column6:
Example:
| name | email |
| Budi | budi@email.com |
| Tono | tono@email.com |

column3: POST posts with valid path and empty request body only three field
column5:
When set path to comments/
And Set request body name is "<name>" 
And Click send button
Then API should return response 400 Bad Request

column3: POST posts with valid path and invalid all Request body
column5:
When set path to comments/
And Set request body name is "<name>", email is "<email>", body is "<body>", post id is <post id>
And Click send button
Then API should return response 400 Bad Request
column9:
Or you can using this Json
{
    "name": "",
    "email": " ",
    "body": " ",
    "postId": " "
}

column3: POST comments with valid path and valid all data
column5:
When set path to comments/
And Set request body name is "<name>", email is "<email>", body is "<body>", post id is <post id>
And Click send button
Then API should return response 201 Created
And API should return body data post id, id, name, email and body
column6:
| name | email | body | post id |
| tono | tono@email.com | hallo semua | 4 |
| deni | deni@email.com | selamat pagi | 6 |
column9:
Or you can using this Json
{
    "name": "tono",
    "email": " tono@email.com",
    "body": " hallo semua ",
    "postId": " 4 "
}

column3: POST comments with invalid path
column5:
When set path to comment/
And Set request body name is "<name>", email is "<email>", body is "<body>", post id is <post id>
And Click send button
Then API should return response 400 Bad Request
column6:
| string | name | email | body | post id |
| sdfk | tono | tono@email.com | hallo semua | 4 |
| @$@ | deni | deni@email.com | selamat pagi | 6 |
column9:
Or you can using this Json
{
    "name": "tono",
    "email": " tono@email.com",
    "body": " hallo semua ",
    "postId": " 4 "
}

column3: PUT without id and userId

column3: PATCH posts with valid id
column4:
Given Base URL is https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/
And Set Method PATCH
column5:
When set path to posts/<id>
And Set request body name is "<title>"  and  "<body>"
And Click send button
Then API should return response 200 OK
And API should return body data user id, id, title, and body
column6:
Example :
| id | title | body |
| 1 | Testing update | Cobain testing artikel |
| 2 | Update testing | Cobain artikel testing |

column3: PATCH posts with invalid id
column5:
When set path to posts/"<stringID>"
And Set request body name is "<title>"  and  "<body>"
And Click send button
Then API should return response 400 Bad Request
column6:
Example :
| stringID | title | body |
| asa | Testing update | Cobain testing artikel |
| @#$ | Update testing | Cobain artikel testing |

| id | title | body |
| 101 | Testing update | Cobain testing artikel |
| 102 | Update testing | Cobain artikel testing |
